Package com.dannyrlarsen.wordcount

Class WC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dannyrlarsen.wordcount.WC

  • public class WC
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Daniel Larsen (culv3r) This program takes a file, "input.txt", parses the file and stores word frequency inside a Map. The Map is then sorted using Streams and formatted as a frequency descending histogram in file: "output.txt".
